import React, { useContext } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import FirebaseContext from "../context/firebase"; import UserContext from "../context/user"; import * as ROUTES from "../constants/routes"; export default function Header() { const { firebase } = useContext(FirebaseContext); const { user } = useContext(UserContext); return (

{user ? ( <>
) : ( <> )}
); }
